articles.title: #TECH: Will you still be able to use WhatsApp after Jan 1, 2021? - New Straits Times
articles.description: AS of Jan 1, 2021, the WhatsApp mobile application will only be compatible with smartphones running iOS 9 and Android 4.0.3, or any other newer operating system. This excludes older models such as the iPhone 4 or the Samsung Galaxy SII.
